sicsim.network.core
Class FailureDetector

java.lang.Object
  sicsim.network.core.FailureDetector

public class FailureDetector
extends java.lang.Object

This class prepare a failure detector that helps peer to detect the failure of other peers in the overlay.

Constructor Summary

public FailureDetector(SicSim sim,

Method Detail

register

public void register(NodeId nodeId,
                     NodeId requesterId)
The peers register the peers of interest in failure detector by calling this method.

Parameters:
nodeId - The node id of peer of interest.
requesterId - The node id of peer who wants to register for the peer of interest.

unregister

public void unregister(NodeId nodeId,
                       NodeId requesterId)
The peers unregister current registered peers in failure detector by calling this method.

Parameters:
nodeId - The node id of peer of interest.
requesterId - The node id of peer who wants to register for the peer of interest.

gerRegisterdNodes

public java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> gerRegisterdNodes(NodeId nodeId)
Returns the list of peers who registerd for one peer.

Parameters:
nodeId - The node id of registered peer.
Returns:
List of peers who are registered for 'nodeId'.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

saveState

public void saveState(long currentTime)
Save the state of the failure detector in a file. The file name is specified in SicsSimConfig.FAILURE_DETECTOR_FILE.

See Also:
SicsimConfig

loadState

public void loadState()
Load the state of the failure detector from file. The file name is specified in SicsSimConfig.FAILURE_DETECTOR_FILE.

See Also:
SicsimConfig
